name: Antoine Riard
cooked:
halseth:

and there are no guarantees about the UTXO not being reused for multiple proofs.

So no guarantee that the utxo set inclusion proof cannot be double-spend, and as such a channel_announcement being unboundedly replay to dos lightning nodes.
topic_title: Proving UTXO set inclusion in zero-knowledge
topic_html_title: Proving UTXO set inclusion in zero-knowledge
raw:
[quote="halseth, post:1, topic:1142"]
and there are no guarantees about the UTXO not being reused for multiple proofs.
[/quote]

So no guarantee that the utxo set inclusion proof cannot be double-spend, and as such a `channel_announcement` being unboundedly replay to dos lightning nodes.
excerpt: So no guarantee that the utxo set inclusion proof cannot be double-spend, and as such a channel_announcement being unboundedly replay to dos lightning nodes.
